scripts.get-schema: rm -f ./schema.prisma && cp ../database/prisma/schema.prisma ./schema.prisma && for f in ../database/prisma/models/*.prisma; do echo '\n' >> ./schema.prisma && cat $f >> ./schema.prisma; done
scripts.add-esm-generator: echo '' >> ./schema.prisma && echo "generator client-esm {" >> ./schema.prisma && echo '  provider = "prisma-client"'  >> ./schema.prisma && echo '  binaryTargets = ["native"]' >> ./schema.prisma && echo '  previewFeatures = ["relationJoins"]' >> ./schema.prisma && echo '  output = "./src/prisma"' >> ./schema.prisma && echo "}" >> ./schema.prisma
scripts.build: npm run get-schema && npm run add-esm-generator && npx prisma@6.19.0 generate --generator client-esm && npx rollup --config rollup.config.ts --configPlugin typescript
